settings.title: Very satisfied
settings.content: Very satisfied with the various products offered by Emma. My last purchase "mattress protector" and I am still not disappointed! I highly recommend it.

settings.content: Highly recommended. Great service. Very nice mattress, very comfortable. I got the protector for it too which is essential since I always have my doggie on it too. Keep your mattress looking, smelling, and feeling brand-new with our Breathable Mattress Protector with Tri-Protect‚Ñ¢ Action:

  • Hygienic: Protects your mattress investment from life's spills, keeping it fresh & brand new
  • Hypoallergenic: Protects your health and sensitive skin from dust mites & allergens
  • Breathable: Protects your comfort with material that promotes good airflow

settings.title: Allergy-Busting
settings.content: Dust mites are responsible for triggering 70% of all respiratory allergies. Our mattress protector is made with revolutionary AllergyShield technology and is clinically proven to protect you from dust mites, and pet hair allergens.

settings.title: Maximum Protection
settings.content: Our mattress protector comes with a 100% waterproof EmmaGuard layer that protects your mattress from spills, crumbs and other unwanted nasties! It needs a clean? Simply pop it in your washing machine at a cool 40¬∞ C!

settings.title: Breathable + Comfortable
settings.content: Our incredibly soft protector is highly breathable and keeps you fresh and cool throughout the night. It perfectly hugs your mattress with a 360¬∞Grip and is crinkle-free - you'll feel the comfort but won't hear a thing.

settings.title: How does the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector work?
settings.content: The Breathable Mattress Protector has Tri-Protect‚Ñ¢ Action. Its polyurethane layer prevents unwanted liquid from getting into the mattress. It also uses Purotex¬Æ technology which reduces allergens (i.e. dust mites, animal hair) by up to 93.7%, and is made with a breathable material. All these keep your mattress well-protected from stains, allergens, and prolongs the useful comfortable life of your mattress.

settings.title: Is the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector completely stain-resistant?
settings.content: Yes, the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector is completely stain-resistant. Although, colored liquids may still discolor the protective layer (i.e. red wine); however, these stains can still be washed off in the washing machine at a maximum of 40¬∞C.

settings.title: Is the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector waterproof?
settings.content: Yes, the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector is completely waterproof. This means that no liquid will get into your Emmamattress as long as the Breathable Mattress Protector is there.

settings.title: Does the Emma Breathable Mattress Protector have a trial period and warranty?
settings.content: The Emma Breathable Mattress Protector has a 60-night trial period, where you can enjoy it risk-free! It also has a warranty period of 2 years upon receipt. For more information on warranty claims, please visit our Terms and Conditions or contact our Customer Care agents from 6 AM - 9 PM EST through our available channels.

settings.title: Construction, Materials, and Certifications
settings.content:
Characteristics
‚Ä¢Top: 100% Polyester with 3D knit design. White PU foil on the back side.
‚Ä¢Top fabrics treated with Purotex contains microcapsules that are filled with natural probiotics. Probiotics are a 100% natural remedy against allergenic sleep disrupters.
‚Ä¢Sides: 100% Polyester with 3D knit design. Dark gray knit fabric going into the bottom to attached to the mattress.

Certification
‚Ä¢OEKO-Tex¬Æ 100 Certified Class 1 (ZHNO 042008) of OEKO-Tex Standard 100.
‚Ä¢What does it mean?
Meets the highest standard and are therefore suitable for infants.

settings.title: Size and Weight
settings.content:
Twin: 38 x 75 x 13 in
Full: 54 x 75 x 13 in
Queen: 60 x 80 x 13 in

settings.title: Country of Origin
settings.content: Designed by Sleep Scientists in Germany and delivered straight to your home from our warehouse in Toronto. No middleman fees, just the best prices. All mattresses are manufactured to our high quality assurance standards.

settings.title: Delivery and Returns
settings.content:
Free Delivery
We work with the top carriers in Canada to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns
Enjoy a 60-nights free trial on your Emma Mattress Protector. We typically require an adjustment period of at least 3 weeks as our researchers confirm that it takes around that long to get suited to your Emma product. Of course, we've made returning of any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest.

If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email our support team at support@emma-sleep.ca or call us at +1-844-906-3662.

settings.title: Happy Sleepers Worldwide
settings.subtitle: Curious as to why millions of customers in over 30 countries have chosen Emma? See what they have to say about us.
